Ben: So as far as nursing in South Sudan, what are those challenges that you face specifically that you thing Solar Spell can help address? So, why do you thing Solar Spell is specifically valuable in the nursing Space

The Second thing that is also lacking is internet
There is no internet in the country and the good thing is Solar Spell comes as an offline library, were you donï¿½t even worry about the internet

Itï¿½s a big thing as well but I do believe that as technology is evolving and as devices are coming and the country is developing, majority of people are starting to get resources and devices especially in urban areas

The most important thing is availability of the information that we need to have to be able to have the practitioners to be able to remind themselves about the information they have forgotten
